name: Atlantic Technologies
slogan: Ground-breaking digital solutions on the Salesforce platform
description: From implementing the latest Salesforce solutions to conducting health checks, Atlantic Technologies’ experienced consultants are here to make your everyday business operations as easy as ABC. Our team has a clear goal: to provide face-to-face, personalised service that helps you streamline your business on the Salesforce platform.

jobs.title: Salesforce Consultant - Next GEN Salesforce Consultancy
jobs.description:
Atlantic Technologies UK are quickly expanding, and we’re looking for a talented, energetic, and highly motivated Project Manager to join our London-based team. You will work closely with our leadership team in the UK, and lead our Design, Implementation, and Delivery teams on projects with clients.

Job Summary:
Plans, initiates, & manages the day-to-day activities of multi-cloud Salesforce projects
Coordinates and directs project teams to ensure that client requirements are taken into account in functional and technical design documents
Works closely with client project sponsors and key stakeholders to ensure project success
Manages program budgets, closely manages scope and associated program and project costs, produces and leads weekly status reports for internal and external stakeholders
A full job description is available upon request


Salesforce Consultants who wish to be considered for this position must possess the following:
- Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline
- 5+ years of Project Management experience, specifically with Salesforce and/or other cloud-based platforms
- Prior Salesforce experience, specifically overseeing design and implementation projects on the platform
- A minimum of two Salesforce Certifications (preferred)
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to work cohesively within a team and/or effectively as an individual
- Familiarity and experience with using various project management tools, spreadsheets, and other cloud-based solutions
- Passionate about delivering value to both the business and clients
- Exceptional interpersonal and facilitation skills – ability to interact and work with all levels of project sponsor’s team

***We'd love to hear from you if you think you'd be a great fit. Please reach out to Marc Shergill (Hiring Manager)***
